videos.description: Darius Garland comes up with the steal and delivers an outlet pass to Evan Mobley, who lobs it to Lauri Markkanen for the slam.

videos.description: Omer Yurtseven drives hard to the rack but has his efforts denied by Jarrett Allen.

videos.headline: Jarrett Allen erases Omer Yurtseven's dunk attempt

videos.description: Darius Garland blows by his defender with a hesitation move and then throws a perfect lob to Jarrett Allen.

videos.headline: Garland pulls off a nasty hesi before tossing a beautiful lob to Allen

videos.description: Kyle Lowry makes one move and puts Lauri Markkanen on the deck before nailing the 3-pointer
